title: spigot-1.8插件兼容性统计表
author: john180
txt_content:
本帖最后由 john180 于 2014-11-30 17:13 编辑 

插件兼容性统计表插件结果插件链接备注AngryGolemFailedhttp://addons.cursecdn.com/files/807/816/AngryGolems.jarhttp://pastebin.com/QtCMRywNAuthmeReloadedSuccesshttp://addons.cursecdn.com/files/795/227/AuthMe.jarChestShopSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/media/files/809/969/ChestShop.jarReported by @asmit119 - small errors but functionalChestShop NotifierSuccesshttp://www.curse.com/bukkit-plugins/minecraft/csnReported by @asmit119ChestShopLoggerSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/media/files/799/625/ChestShopLogger.jarReported by @asmit119ChopTreeSuccesshttp://www.spigotmc.org/resources/choptree-1-8-update.2046/Confirmed by the author.ClickSortSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/clicksort/CombatTagSuccesshttps://s3.amazonaws.com/github-cloud/releases/25184855/dd421832-7422-11e4-9e01-f2937cc15fb8.jar.CombatTagFailedhttps://s3.amazonaws.com/github-cloud/releases/25184855/dd421832-7422-11e4-9e01-f2937cc15fb8.jarPlugin enables, then disables immediately afterCommandHelperFailedhttp://builds.enginehub.org/job/commandhelper/6152Does not fire any commands. Error message "Could not pass event PlayerCommandPreprocessEvent to CommandHelper v3.3.0
org.bukkit.event.EventException"CommandRankFailedhttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/commandrank-permissionsbukkit/files/73-v3-2-1/Plugin folder created but did not function in the server.CommandSpySuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/commandspy/CoreProtectSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/coreprotect/Cannot log data about new blocks added in 1.8.CraftbookSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/craftbook/files/113-craft-book-v3-9-for-1-8/Works without problems :)
regards
SemiDynamicDifficultySuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/media/files/805/988/DynamicDifficulty.jarDynmapSuccesshttp://mikeprimm.com/dynmap/builds/dynmap/dynmap-2.1-SNAPSHOT.jarSeems to work 99% fine. Some render logs do not seem to appear in the chat, don't know whether intentional or not.EchoPetFailedhttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/echopet/files/31-echo-pet-v2-5-0/EnderRankupFailedhttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/enderrankup/In /pl it doesn't even show up not red or green or even in /plEnjinMinecraftPluginSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/media/files/817/987/EnjinMinecraftPlugin.jarReported by @asmit119EssentialsSuccesshttps://hub.spigotmc.org/jenkins/job/Spigot-Essentials/Official from Spigot TeamGAListenerSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/give-anything-listener/files/13-galistener-1-3-1/SuccessfulGriefPreventionSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/media/files/833/268/GriefPrevention.jarGroupManagerSuccesshttp://www.spigotmc.org/resources/groupmanager.23/Reported by @asmit119HelpfulMobsSuccesshttp://www.spigotmc.org/resources/helpfulmobs.580/Reported by @asmit119 - small errors but functionalHorsesSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/horse-stables/KillermoneySuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/killermoney/Works perfectly. No Errors - ModalIncLWCFailedhttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/lwc/files/37-lwc-4-4-0/LWC does not protect 1.8 doors.mcMMoSuccesshttp://ci.ecocitycraft.com/job/mcMMO/3710/So far it all seems to work perfectly. No Errors - ModalIncMobBountyReloadedSuccesshttp://addons.cursecdn.com/files/796/942/MobBountyReloaded.jarMondoChestFailedhttp://addons.cursecdn.com/files/792/835/MondoChest.jarPlugin is enabled and operates, signs do not register.Multiverse-CoreOtherhttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/multiverse-core/files/23-2-4-ab/Some world attributes lost from 1.7 to 1.8. For example: Normal terrain is generating just outside the borders of formerly superflat maps.Multiverse-SignPortalsFailedhttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/multiverse-signportals/files/8-2-4-ab/Signs repeatedly state that they're validated when right-clicked, and do not teleport the player. (/mvtp command from base multiverse plugin functions as a workaround.)multiworldFailedhttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/multiworld-v-2-0/MysteryCratesFailedhttp://www.spigotmc.org/resources/mysterycrates.557/Reported by @asmit119NameTagEditSuccesshttp://ci.playmc.cc/job/NametagEdit/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/target/NametagEdit.jarReported by Owner of NTENoCheatPlusSuccesshttp://ci.md-5.net/job/NoCheatPlus/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/target/NoCheatPlus.jarReported by @asmit119OnTimeSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/ontime/PaydayFailedhttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/Payday/This project is abandoned but it worked before and is usefulPermissionsExSuccesshttps://hub.spigotmc.org/jenkins/job/PermissionsEx/Official from Spigot TeamPlayerheadsSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/player-heads/Works perfectly. No Errors - ModalIncProtocolLibSuccesshttp://www.spigotmc.org/resources/protocollib.1997/Updated for 1.8PurpleIRCSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/purpleirc/files/72-v2-1-14-174/ServerListPlusSuccesshttp://www.spigotmc.org/resources/serverlistplus.241/Waiting for ProtocolLib 1.8 dependency.SilkSpawnersSuccesshttps://ci.dustplanet.de/job/SilkSpawners/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/target/SilkSpawners.jarReported by @asmit119SQLPermsSuccesshttp://www.spigotmc.org/resources/sqlperms-1-8-compatible-black-friday-sale-limited-time.1462/Everything worked 100% with no code changes.TARDISSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/tardis/Some control things changed, but works just like it did before.UltimateCoreSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/ultimate_coreOld file worked. Altough there is a new update available to add new features.UltraTraderFailedhttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/ultratrader/Vanish No PacketSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/media/files/787/504/VanishNoPacket.jarReported by @asmit119VotifierSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/votifier/files/9-votifier-1-9/Loaded fine.VoxelSniperSuccesshttp://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/voxelsniper/files/22-voxel-sniper-5-170-0-snapshot/It worked perfectly except for the /v command in which case you couldnt use any andesite or anything or you couldn't hold shift and right click to change to andesite/any 1.8 block.WorldBorderSuccesshttp://addons.cursecdn.com/files/815/975/WorldBorder.jarWorldEditSuccesshttps://www.dropbox.com/s/a4ikpmbb0sey2z3/worldedit-6.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar?dl=0Works fine if you use the version available from this linkWorldGuardSuccesshttps://hub.spigotmc.org/jenkins/job/WorldGuard/Official from Spigot TeamzPermissionsSuccesshttps://hub.spigotmc.org/jenkins/job/zPermissions/Official from Spigot Team
因为论坛帖子格式问题,表格显示可能有错位,各位可以自己下载下来看http://pan.baidu.com/s/1ntidyh7

转自spigot论坛
原帖地址:http://www.spigotmc.org/threads/ ... ibility-list.36627/

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content: 头一次发现1.8还有这么多插件...才出来几个月= =

replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2014-11-30 17:13

replies.author: 叁只番茄
replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2014-11-30 17:13
头一次发现1.8还有这么多插件...才出来几个月= =
1.8的插件服务端才出来2天
1.8是向下兼容的 因为保留了原本的BukkitAPI 是在原本的BukkitAPI上改进更新的
可能会因为机制的改变有些插件不兼容

从表上可以看得出很多插件都兼容 有少数不兼容嗯...
可能需要更新
顺带一提BungeeCord跨服也兼容√

replies.txt_content:

bukkitAPI可不像某forge
一换版本就函数方法名各种变_(:з」∠)_

replies.author: 叁只番茄
replies.txt_content:
练习册 发表于 2014-12-7 13:55
希望新mcpc+【好像这个作者在这次风暴中弃坑了】作者能重新坑回bungeecord的兼容又或者md-5重新卡法 ...
cauldron表示已经抛弃了bukkit/spigot
在官方服务端上全新开发 使用spongeAPI
再加上一句话 抛弃了forge_(:з」∠)_
也就是说新的cauldron 不能用bukkit插件 不能用forge Mod
全都是在spongeAPI上

他们做这个尝试真是太有胆子了
就是不知道结果会怎样

【要不来让md_5基于spigot开发个能用forge Mod的服务端√名字叫waterpipe~】

replies.author: PatchouliHina
replies.txt_content:
叁只番茄 发表于 2014-12-7 17:45
cauldron表示已经抛弃了bukkit/spigot
在官方服务端上全新开发 使用spongeAPI
再加上一句话 抛弃了forge_ ...
Sponge是支持forge mod的，只不过不能使用水桶的api，Sponge自己的API已经初步完成了，现在正在基于Forge1.8进行开发
